pages.text: Gettings items from the pot of gold requires this colorful metal called arconium. One cannot just craft this. The first step towards making it, is to create an enchanted red tree root that will make the pot produce arconium essence. As I explained elsewhere, enchanting tree roots is done using the pedestal altar setup.

For this recipe, unless it was altered (consult $(italic)JEI$()!), you have to put four items on four different wood pedestals. The items are a four leaf clover, another four leaf clover, a piece of red wool, and a red tree root. Once they are all in place, right click the center pedestal with the clover staff to start the enchanting ritual.
